name: 東方氷球祭 Touhou Ice Hockey Festival
name_original: 東方氷球祭 Touhou Ice Hockey Festival
description:
Introduction

The winter youkai, Letty Whiterock, decided to host Gensokyo's very first hockey festival and the first ice hockey championship. The finalists are:

  • Reimu
  • Marisa
  • Cirno
  • Letty

And in this game, they will fight each other to see who's the best ice hockey player in Gensokyo!

Controls
  • Your character will follow your mouse.
  • Left mouse button: Click to shoot. Every character has a different shot type, with different mechanics.
  • Right mouse button: Hold to highlight your character's collider. This isn't very useful, but it's there if you need it.
  • Escape key: Pause / Unpause
Rules / Info

(Written down for clarity, though it's entirely possible to skip this section and just get right into the game)

  • Move your character (paddle) to knock the puck (yin-yang orb) into the opponent's goal! It's really just air hockey.
  • The first player to get 5 points wins.
    • Enable "Easy Mode" in the Settings panel to change it to "First to get 1 point wins".
  • In this game, you can harass the opponent with your shot. When a player is hit by a bullet, they will get stunned briefly (length depends on the shot type), and their paddle (collider)'s size will shrink temporarily.
  • Combine the typical air hockey strategies with your bullets, and you'll be able to overcome your opponent!
  • The game has an arcade mode (story mode where you fight three consecutive opponents with plot), and a versus mode where you can pick your own matchups.
